mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a group of color photographs taken at the exhibition, "Lexington's Black Community," at Washington and Lee University in the spring of 1987. A few of the photographs have handwritten notes indicating the exhibit included pictures of the Walker property at 28-30 Main Street and a contract for supplying meat for VMI in 1921.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Exhibition on Lexington's Black Community, 1987 (photographs)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: African Americans
Virginia -- Lexington
Twentieth century
